column4: Hello. I do have a netbook with a bcm4315 chipset. normally the hardware-driver-installer shows me two drivers: b24 and sta. But this install I only see the sta driver. How do I get the b24 driver? In synaptic I only could find the fwcutter for the b24 driver ...?
does the sta driver not work?
i had an odd laptop. that used the sta driver.. but the silly sta module wouldent autoload.. not sure why that was
yea. I had similer issues.. but that laptop is now gone. :)
